message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $135 to make this a deal.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $135, but I'm still not sure if that's the best price for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for it.
